alert.note: Alert for Coles; Douglas; Macon; Moultrie; Piatt; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 9:20PM CDT until August 25 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COLES...MOULTRIE...CENTRAL SHELBY...SOUTHERN PIATT...SOUTHWESTERN DOUGLAS AND SOUTHEASTERN MACON COUNTIES... At 920 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lovington, or 9 miles north of Sullivan, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Atwood, Cooks Mill, Arcola and Humboldt. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 196 and 207. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coles; Douglas; Macon; Moultrie; Piatt; Shelby
